Title: One Hundred Steps
Writer: Claudio Fava, Marco Tullio Giordana, Vanda Vaz (adaptation), Monica Zapelli
Actors: Luigi Lo Cascio, Luigi Maria Burruano, Lucia Sardo, Paolo Briguglia
Plot: "I cento passi" (one hundred steps) was the distance between the Impastatos' house and the house of Tano Badalamenti, an important Mafia boss, in the small Sicilian town of Cinisi. The ...
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 19 wins & 19 nominations.
